title: Why am i doing so bad with pyke?
body:
i am getting hard stomped by every support while playing pyke and i cant find any decent builds online.Long story short i enjoy playing him but feel useless in both supporting and assassinating other people any thoughts? 
               {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

replies.body:
he doesn't seem very good, at all

which means he'll be overbuffed before people can figure out the best build

Thank you all for the feedback i will take most of the advice to improve my game play appreciate ya

 {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

I wouldn't say i am support main but i do play it a decent amount and i play with caitlyn adc. I just do not feel like i can roam as i would get insta killed by the jungler if i were to get caught out. The main problem i struggle with is to save my adc, the potential is there but i feel like other supports are far more superior in saving and doing more dps than pyke wich is a shame cos the thematic and play style is very interesting to me.

Bro he came out yesterday.

You can't expect to be a master on him when he hasn't even been out for a week yet.

Get some practice on him first.

I main support in summoners rift, but i play ARAM way more.
he is the worst champion in the game in ARAM, period. his entire kit is tank abilities but he cant tank. hes incredibly easy to kill but cant harass.  his cast range is tiny. his whole kit screams frontline, but hes so fragile that by the time hes in range to cast anything the enemy control mage or adc has killed him. at this point in ARAM his perma corpse is basically a gold buff for the other team.
Honestly before they announced his passive, he looked incedible. hopefully they change his passive so he can tank and lower his damage to compensate
He's honestly fine. Just take a while to learn his in's and outs, he's got very distinct moments of power and if you pick the wrong time to go in you WILL get punished.

First of all, are you a support main?
Secondly, Pyke benefits highly from roaming. If you can help your jungler in the crab skirmish or rush mobility boots to gank mid, he can make your team go largely ahead. 
His laning is not easy but I'd advice you to suggest your adc to pick a bursty ADC{{champion:110}} {{champion:145}} {{champion:21}} to maximize the potential.
